passage_text: 1 A recessed light costs $10 to $35. 2  To install an overhead light, ceiling fan light unit or a chandelier to an existing lighting fixture plan on around $50 to $100. 3  Ceiling fan lights start at around $75 and can cost up to $500 or more. 4  An average quality ceiling light fixture costs $30 to $200.

The cost to install recessed lighting generally ranges between $66 and $133 for each light. If the ceiling is already open, as in a home under construction or a room that is already being renovated, the cost will be on the low side of the range.

Basics. Basic recessed lights run from $20 to $60 on average, states Cost Helper. If you want a more energy-efficient model that generates less heat, expect to pay from $75 to $150. Add to this the cost of paying the electrician, which will cost $50 to $200 per light, depending on the type of installation they require.

1 An Oregon do-it-yourselfer installed eight recessed lights in a kitchen with an open ceiling for $180. 2  Having an electrician install the lights in an open ceiling can run $50-$200 or more per light (and averages about $125-$150) depending on local rates and the relative ease of installation.

1 The cost to install recessed lighting is roughly $100 to $150 per light. 2  A recessed light costs $10 to $35. 3  To install an overhead light, ceiling fan light unit or a chandelier to an existing lighting fixture plan on around $50 to $100.

Cost of the Lights. Low-end recessed lights cost between $20 and $60 each. Higher-end, low-voltage recessed lighting can cost $75 to $150 or more per light. Each light requires a housing that goes into the ceiling and a trim that covers gaps between the housing and the drywall.

Get an INSTANT estimate of the cost to Install Recessed Lighting! Our free calculator uses recent, trusted data to estimate costs for your Recessed Light Installation project. For a basic 1 light project in zip code 47474, the benchmark cost to Install Recessed Lighting ranges between $185.86 - $336.37 per light.
